reviewText:
Unfortunately, this great documentary is currently not available on Amazon.com or Amazon Prime. However,
Netflix is showing this documentary film. It is great for college students and university studies. I
recommend for higher educational learning. The documentary will give great clarity about the politics and, propaganda behind Cannabis and Hemp.
This DVD is not worth the price and was not well produced.  I should have bought the book.  The book is great by the way!
It's just a bunch of people reading from the book, I mean literally standing in front of a camera reading the text and it's incomplete at that. Nothing new.
Great information about the truth of Medical Marijuana and it's history. Great research and documentation throughout this video, the book is great too.
I literally thought I was buying a special edition of the book, no just a sad documentary of the book. So dissappointed.
